name: qtopbas

body.origin:
|- wcel(cima(cioo, cxp(cq, cq)), ctb)
-| wss(cq, cxr)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cima(cioo, cxp(cq, cq)), ctb)
-| wss(cq, cxr)

body.origin:
|- wss(cq, cxr)
-| wss(cq, cr)
-| wss(cr, cxr)
body.pretty:
⊢ ℚ ⊆ ℝ*
⊣ ℚ ⊆ ℝ
⊣ ℝ ⊆ ℝ*

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cima(cioo, cxp(cq, cq)), ctb)
-| wss(cq, cr)
-| wss(cr, cxr)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((,)"(ℚ × ℚ))∈ TopBases
⊣ ℚ ⊆ ℝ
⊣ ℝ ⊆ ℝ*

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cima(cioo, cxp(cq, cq)), ctb)
-| wss(cr, cxr)

comment: The set of open intervals with rational endpoints forms a basis for a topology. (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2007.)
